description: Hedge fund managers are increasingly betting Saudi Arabia and its allies cannot or will not replace all the crude lost from the market when U.S. sanctions on Iran go into effect fully from November.
title: RPT-COLUMN-Hedge funds doubt Saudi Arabia will replace Iranian oil:Kemp
